title: How to Tell Your Girlfriend That You Want to Marry Her

steps.headline: Make sure that you know that you love her with all of your heart, otherwise things may not run smoothly in the long run.
steps.description: If you're not sure that you love her then maybe you shouldn't be looking at this.

steps.headline: Find out if she feels the same way.
steps.description: You don't want to rush things if it is too soon.

steps.headline: Find ideas of rings that she might like.
steps.description: You should have a ring to propose.

steps.headline: Buy the ring, but just make sure it is a reasonable price,  not too much and not too little.
Take her out in public.
steps.description: A fancy restaurant is really nice and extremely romantic.

steps.headline: Make sure you look nice.
steps.description: It's hard for a girl to say "no" when everything is romantic.

steps.headline: Finally, at the end of the romantic evening, get down on one knee and say, "(name of girl) will you marry me?"
If and when she says 'yes', put the engagement ring on her finger and get up and kiss her if you want to.

tyn: Love in your heart for your girlfriend
text: Make sure that you know that you love her with all of your heart, otherwise things may not run smoothly in the long run. If you're not sure that you love her then maybe you shouldn't be looking at this. Find out if she feels the same way. You don't want to rush things if it is too soon. Find ideas of rings that she might like. You should have a ring to propose. Buy the ring, but just make sure it is a reasonable price,  not too much and not too little.  Take her out in public. A fancy restaurant is really nice and extremely romantic. Make sure you look nice. It's hard for a girl to say "no" when everything is romantic. Finally, at the end of the romantic evening, get down on one knee and say, "(name of girl) will you marry me?"  If and when she says 'yes', put the engagement ring on her finger and get up and kiss her if you want to.
sentences: Make sure that you know that you love her with all of your heart, otherwise things may not run smoothly in the long run.
If you're not sure that you love her then maybe you shouldn't be looking at this.
Find out if she feels the same way.
You don't want to rush things if it is too soon.
Find ideas of rings that she might like.
You should have a ring to propose.
Buy the ring, but just make sure it is a reasonable price,  not too much and not too little.
A fancy restaurant is really nice and extremely romantic.
It's hard for a girl to say "no" when everything is romantic.
Finally, at the end of the romantic evening, get down on one knee and say, "(name of girl) will you marry me?"
If and when she says 'yes', put the engagement ring on her finger and get up and kiss her if you want to.
